pkgmetadata.longdescription: Standardized Moderation Effect and Its Confidence Interval // Functions for computing a standardized moderation effect in moderated regression and forming its confidence interval by nonparametric bootstrapping as proposed in Cheung, Cheung, Lau, Hui, and Vong (2002) doi:10.1037/hea0001188. Also includes simple-to-use functions for computing conditional effects (unstandardized or standardized) and plotting moderation effects.
